Guardian Irene:
What is most important to us at the moment is to clean up the environment so that we might revive the Mother Tree.
If the Aden Continent becomes polluted, the Mother Tree will try to purify the continent, even if it means sacrificing herself. What I'm worried about at the moment is that the pollution of the Enchanted Valley has already begun.
I think there is something that you might be able to do to address the pollution problem. Would you listen to what I have to tell you?
